notes: Very modern, clean apartment with updated fixtures including split AC units, recessed lighting, and contemporary furniture. The open-plan living/kitchen area and bedroom show excellent condition with built-in wardrobes and storage. For baby safety: no visible balcony or stairs, rounded furniture edges on sofa and bed, but low coffee tables and window sills at accessible heights may need childproofing. Good natural light through zebra blinds, floors are clean tile and light wood.
